answers.answer: The Menstrual Cycle tracker will be a big help to lots of ladies on here.  Very cool, Anita
LOL I wouldn't have anything to put on the menstrual tracker LOL I hadn't had a period in 4 years!
I will use it after my baby is born but not right now
Manstrual cycle tracker will be great.

question: I got the following message from MedHelp and wanted to pass the information onto you ladies! I think the Menstrual Cycle Tracker will be beneficial to many of you here!Hi,Yesterday four new trackers were released that you, members of your community, and/or friends/family will want to use!MenopauseMenstrual CycleTemperatureAutoimmune DisordersPlease let your community members know these trackers are available and, as a reminder, don't forget our Diabetes tracker which was released two weeks ago is available, too.To view/install the trackers:Go to MyMedhelpGo to Tracker PanelScroll down to bottom of Tracker PanelClick on "add a tracker"Choose your tracker
title: *New Trackers*
